item.description:
This is a 90 minute, 3 mile walk through Belmont with lots of nice homes to look at. The highlights are the Cambridge Reservoir, a uniquely decorated oriental home Nancy and I discovered, and the Clay Pit Pond.

Meet at 7 in the municipal parking lot next to Starbucks, I think the parking is free after 6.


A map of the route can be seen at:
http://maps.google.co...

The walk begins at Trapelo and Cushing
Cushing Ave to the reservoir
around the reservoir with a detour to see the oriental house
back to Oakley Rd on the NW side of the reservoir
N on Oakley which becomes Goden St
R on Orhard St
around Clay Pit Pond
cross over Concord St and go a little to the left to Watson St
S on Watson St
R on Washington
L on Hillside Terrace
R on Cushing to Trapelo
item.name: Belmont Clay Pit Pond walk
